div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1131 Cherronesus (near mod. Sevastopol'), 1944 Burial: late 2nd cent. B.C. Contents: 36+ AR, 67+AE. Pot hoard Cherronesus: 2 tetradr. (as Minns, pl. 4, 13) 19 didr. (as Zograph, pl. 36, 2 [11]; BMC 1 [8]) 15 dr. (as BMC 2) 67 AE (as Zograph, pl. 35, 16 [33]; BMC 6 [13], 7-8 [21]) (coins with variant types, different magistrates, ctmks.) Disposition: Sevastopol' Takhtai, KhSb 4 (1948), pp. 113-25
